Key Match Events: Piero Hincapié scored in the 13th minute for Ecuador.
Kendry Páez scored a penalty in the 45'+4' minute for Ecuador.
Michail Antonio scored in the 54th minute for Jamaica.
Alan Minda scored in the 90'+1' minute for Ecuador.
Post-Match Reflections: Ecuador kept their hopes of qualifying for the Copa America quarter-finals alive with a 3-1 win over Jamaica.
The result left Jamaica on the brink of elimination.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Allegiant Stadium in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA.
